conclusion: Analyze the path of the liquid from each source and how the baffles guide the flow.
Yellow liquid flows downward and hits the blue baffle.
Blue baffle directs yellow liquid to the left side of the container.
Green liquid flows downward and hits the blue baffle.
Blue baffle directs green liquid to the left side of the container.
Blue liquid flows downward and hits the blue baffle.
Blue baffle directs blue liquid to the left side of the container.
Orange liquid flows downward and hits the gray baffle.
Gray baffle directs orange liquid to the right side of the container.
Yellow, green, and blue liquids flow along the left wall of the container.
Left wall leads yellow, green, and blue liquids to container E.
Orange liquid flows along the right wall of the container.
Right wall leads orange liquid to container G.
Yellow liquid flows into container E.
Green liquid flows into container E.
Blue liquid flows into container E.
Orange liquid flows into container G.
Container E receives liquids from A, B, and C.
Container G receives liquid from D.
